overview: A movie director, a jurist and a boho writer are invited to visit a zoo to create a promotional event. Out there, they discover that the owner of this park mixed genetically different species to create real life dinosaurs. The first enclosures are really disappointing until an electrical failure happens in front of the T-Rex pen, which forces them to run away across the jungle and fight for their survival.
title: Crétacé Parc
